pageProps.content:
Experience

Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa: River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp.
The tented Kapama Buffalo Camp offers adventurous safaris in a remote & pristine bush setting. Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama Buffalo Camp is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time.

Stay

The camp only has 10 luxury safari tents - each built on stilts & connected by wooden walkways to ensure complete privacy. The tents have fantastic views from amongst the treetops & monkeys often come to visit. All tents are equipped with en-suite bathrooms.
The main lodge features a relaxing open-plan lounge, dining room, Buffalo Bar & sparkling swimming pool with uninterrupted bushveld views.

Activities

Kapama Buffalo Camp will take guests on morning & evening safari drives in open 4x4 vehicles. This amazing reserve can also be experienced on foot.
At Kapama, luxury & comfort go hand & hand. Invigorating spa treatments at the nearby Kapama River Lodge will allow guests to relax in a remote & tranquil setting with nothing but the sounds of the wild in the background.
Hot air balloon safaris, photographic workshops & romantic sleep-outs can also be arranged at an additional cost.
